I've spent roughly $200 on League since a started playing several years back. Since then the quality of the service Riot offers has only steadily gone down. They've blatantly lied to their playerbase and shifted the focus of development to esports at the cost of servers that don't  frequently crash and the production of content that the general playerbase can experience and enjoy.

I used to think Riot was a great small company with a fun Dota-like game that I enjoyed. They slowly changed that opinion by getting shittier and shittier. Here I am now venting on the shitty boards that they replaced the actual forums with that nobody wanted them to do. Riot has become a shitty company and the quality of their game has followed suit.
Oooh sick burn bro. Rito should feel ashamed!
